data: “Her Excellency,—will she have the politeness,” said Daphne slowly, reading from a tiny Italian-English phrase-book, “the politeness to”—She stopped helpless.
"Her Excellency,--will she have the politeness," said Daphne slowly, reading from a tiny Italian-English phrase-book, "the politeness to"--She stopped helpless.
